page.title: 08EMPLOYMENT
page.content: We interviewed the Manager of the local Job Centre. She told us that most people go for secretarial or engineering jobs.Half of the people in Rickmansworth work locally and the other half travel into London every day. The local office jobs pay between Â£5,000 and Â£6,500 a year.The lowest wage that any employer can offer is Â£1.50 an hour.This is quite a good area for work because there is only about 7% unemployed. There are quite a few vacancies for teenagers in the sixteen to nineteen age group.
